ygData.subject: Re:Staff Segments - E. Karanas and HPK - third part Jeff?
ygData.msgSnippet: No this is not the Jagged Pine Crook.  Jeff can you find out where this third part comes from? Maybe the location could give a clue as to where this quest
ygData.messageBody:
No this is not the Jagged Pine Crook. Jeff can you find out where this
third part comes from? Maybe the location could give a clue as to where
this quest starts, i'm suspecting that weve come in on the middle of
it. Though I havent seen a referenece to a Battle Staff anywhere except
for on Allakazzams page where apparently Lady McCabe makes some remark
about it. I guess I need to try and find the McCabes and try to get
some information from them.
